alert.note: Alert for Dauphin; Lebanon; Schuylkill; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 3:33PM EDT until September 07 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dauphin County in south central Pennsylvania... Northwestern Lebanon County in south central Pennsylvania... Southwestern Schuylkill County in central Pennsylvania... North central York County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 333 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fort Indiantown Gap, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Harrisburg, Lower Allen, Hershey, Colonial Park, Progress, Middletown, New Cumberland, Linglestown, Steelton, Lemoyne, Hummelstown and Paxtonia. This includes the following Interstates... The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 241 to 253. Interstate 81 from mile markers 68 to 85. Interstate 83 between mile markers 36 and 39, and from mile markers 42 to 50. Interstate 283 from mile markers 0 to 2. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows.
